title: Read currently played song
body: I would like to read currently played song or content in Windows 10. Use case: As neither Groove nor Spotify have a lyrics functionality (anymore) I created a simple UWP app to manage lyrics for songs. I would like to add a function that automatically loads the lyrics to the song that is played right now.

comments.body: This is requested frequently by our RealDash app users. Getting tired of explaining that Windows does not offer an API for this feature, while Android and iOS has no problem with it.
I think we could create an AI to recognising the Song

This would be quite useful. Android has a mechanic like this that allows other apps to read notifications, especially since Android's media transport controls show up in the system notification shade. This could be implemented as a specific permission that has to be granted to the app.
